text:
Box | Onsite SF Bay Area | Engineering | Full time

We're hiring across all teams - from frontend to backend to everything in between. Check out our careers page to find out more: https://www.box.com/careers/engineering/

However, our high priority roles include: - Android: goo.gl/A3NzlJ - Frontend Frameworks: goo.gl/7wK5SN - Infrastructure: goo.gl/nxxgdo

I'm happy to answer any questions below! Or email me at rosetta@box.com
